work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Building CEO legacy Apps for customers

testimonials.text: 5+ years of experience in designing and developing professional UI web applications using front-end technologies like React JS, REDUX, JavaScript, ES6, Object Oriented JavaScript, JQuery, HTML4/5, CSS2/3, Bootstrap, Media Query, AJAX, XML and JSON meeting with W3C standards.
Strong experience with Responsive web design principles using Bootstrap and several CSS features like Flexbox, Media query and Grid system.
Valuable experience in developing and preparing test cases for unit testing using Jest and Enzyme.
Experience in software development methodologies like Agile and Waterfall.
